Articles.Content:
I started this science program with precisely 125 mods, the mods will be in the mod list at the bottom. The purpose of this program is to colonize the solar system, particularly the Jool, Sarvin and Duna systems. I am running this in 1.2.2 64 bit version with Ckan. Haven't had a crash yet, but we will see.

So far, we have sent probes to the Mun, landed on the Mun and set up several relay sats. The unmanned Harold missions, which was the starting program, is now decommissioned. It had brought us from inside the atmosphere to high kerbin orbit. The current mission is Jerry, our Mun mission which has sent landers, and sats. The picture below is the Jerry sat 2, the Jerry sat 1s, carried scientific equipment and, accidentally, direct antena instead of relay. Luckily Jerry sat 2 fixed this.
